title: Coalition hits record low as One Nation surges | 7NEWS
description: The latest Resolve poll shows Labor maintaining a 55% to 45% lead over the Coalition on a two-party preferred basis, while Coalition support has dropped to record lows. Pauline Hanson's One Nation party is gaining momentum in polling, with support potentially increasing if former Nationals MP Barnaby Joyce became leader. Housing concerns and cost of living pressures are driving voter dissatisfaction with migration policy, with two-thirds of voters wanting immigration paused. title: Pepper spray attack injures 21 at Heathrow | 7NEWS
description: Twenty-one people were injured in a pepper spray attack at London's Heathrow Airport during an attempted robbery involving four men. The incident began when a woman was robbed of her suitcase in a lift at Terminal 3, escalating into a security scare that disrupted airport operations and required heavily armed police to search the multi-storey car park. A 31-year-old man was arrested within nine minutes, with police ruling out terrorism and stating it was an isolated incident between people known to each other. title: Natural disaster declared after Central Coast fires | 7NEWS
description: A natural disaster has been declared for six local government areas in New South Wales after the Central Coast region battled more than 70 fires. Dozens of homes have been destroyed but no lives have been lost, with disaster payments announced for affected residents, businesses, primary producers and councils. title: Manhunt underway after fatal Ascot Vale stabbing | 7NEWS
description: A manhunt is underway in Melbourne's inner north after a fatal stabbing incident in Ascot Vale on Sunday afternoon. An unidentified man was found with a stab wound just before 4pm, leading to the arrest of an 18-year-old nearby while a second suspect fled the scene. Homicide detectives are appealing for CCTV and dashcam footage from the public. title: At least 21 injured in pepper spray attack at Heathrow Airport
description: Paramedics have treated 21 people, including a three-year-old girl, after a man deployed pepper spray at London's Heathrow Airport. #heathrow #london #airport #paramedic #pepperspray

title: Firefighter killed in NSW as dozens of fires burn
description: A firefighter has died near Bulahdelah after reportedly being struck by a falling tree on the edge of the bushfire zone. #firefighter #fire #bushfire #bulahdelah #emergency

title: Chernobyl damaged by drone strike, UN finds
description: A UN nuclear watchdog has determined Chernobyl's protective shield can no longer perform its main safety function due to drone damage. #chernobyl #drone #ukraine #russia #unitednations

title: Protesters throw apple crumble at Tower of London display case
description: London Police have arrested four protesters after they threw apple crumble and custard onto a display case at the Tower of London. #toweroflondon #protest #custard #applecrumble #london

title: NSW Liberals announce plan for underage e-bike riders to display licence plates
description: Underage e-bike riders would be forced to display licence plates under a plan proposed by the NSW Liberals, along with food delivery drivers and share bikes. #bike #ebike #electricbike #electric #nswpol

title: Anika Wells under fire over spending on travel
description: Communications Minister Anika Wells is under fire over her spending on travel for herself, family and staff. #anikawells #minister #auspol #travel #spending

title: 'I believed I was in a terrorist attack': The pepper spray attack at Heathrow airport | 7NEWS
description: A suitcase robbery inside a lift at Heathrow Airport's Terminal Three multi-storey car park escalated into a pepper spray attack, injuring 21 people including a three-year-old girl. Armed police swarmed the area and arrested a 31-year-old man within nine minutes, while his associates remained on the run. Police ruled out terrorism, stating those involved were known to each other and an argument had spiralled into violence. title: Former Nationals leader Barnaby Joyce joins One Nation
description: Former Nationals leader Barnaby Joyce has announced he is joining One Nation to run as a Senate candidate for NSW. #barnabyjoyce #nationals #onenation #senate #auspol

title: Koolewong resident's narrow escape from bushfires | 7NEWS
description: A Koolewong resident describes their narrow escape from weekend bushfires that destroyed more than a dozen homes in the area. The fire came within three metres of their house and one metre from their children's play area, with only 118 homes surviving in the affected area. The resident expresses gratitude to firefighters and survivor's guilt while retrieving belongings during the two-week evacuation period. title: New Zealand national charged over alleged importation of heroin into Australia
description: A New Zealand national arrested at Sydney Airport will appear in court accused of importing 21kg of heroin hidden inside his luggage. #nz #newzealand #arrest #charge #airport
